Verses: 1 saamuvel Mudhirvayadhaanapodhu, Than Kumaararai Isravelinmel Niyaayaadhipadhikalaaka Vaiththaan.
2 avanutaiya Mooththakumaaranukkup Peyar Yovel, Ilaiyavanukkup Peyar Apiyaa; Avarkal Peyersepaavile Niyaayaadhipadhikalaayirundhaarkal.
3 aanaalum Avanutaiya Kumaarar Avan Vazhikalil Natavaamal, Porulaasaikkuch Chaaindhu, Paridhaanam Vaangi, Niyaayaththaip Purattinaarkal.
4 appozhudhu Isravelin Mooppar Ellaarum Koottangooti, Raamaavilirundha Saamuvelinitaththil Vandhu;

5 idho, Neer Mudhirvayadhullavaraaneer; Ummutaiya Kumaarar Ummutaiya Vazhikalil Natakkiradhillai; Aakaiyaal Sakala Jaadhikalukkullum Irukkirapati, Engalai Niyaayam Visaarikkiradharku, Oru Raajaavai Erpatuththaventum Endraarkal.
6 engalai Niyaayam Visaarikka Oru Raajaavai Erpatuththum Endru Avarkal Sonna Vaarththai Saamuvelukkuth Thakaadhadhaaik Kaanappattadhu; Aakaiyaal Saamuvel Karththarai Nokki Vinnappampanninaan.
7 appozhudhu Karththar Saamuvelai Nokki: Janangal Unnitaththil Solvadhellaavatrilum Avarkal Sollaik Kel; Avarkal Unnaith Thallavillai, Naan Avarkalai Aalaadhapatikku, Ennaiththaan Thallinaarkal.

8 naan Avarkalai Ekipdhilirundhu Purappatappannina Naal Mudhal Innaalmattum Avarkal Ennaivittu, Vere Thevarkalaich Cheviththuvandha Thangal Ellaach Cheykaikalin Patiyum Seydhadhupola, Avarkal Unakkum Seykiraarkal.
9 ippodhum Avarkal Sollaikkel; Aanaalum Un Apippiraayaththaik Kaattumpati Avarkalai Aalum Raajaavin Kaariyam Innadhu Endru Avarkalukkuth Thitasaatchiyaaith Theriyappatuththu Endraar.
10 appozhudhu Saamuvel, Oru Raajaa Ventum Endru Thannitaththil Ketta Janangalukkuk Karththarutaiya Vaarththaikalaiyellaam Solli:
11 ungalai Aalum Raajaavin Kaariyam Ennavendraal Than Radhaththirku Mun Otumpati Avan Ungal Kumaararai Etuththu, Than Radhasaaradhikalaakavum Than Kudhiraiveeraraakavum Vaiththukkolluvaan.

12 aayiramperukkum Aimpadhu Perukkum Thalaivaraakavum, Than Nilaththai Uzhukiravarkalaakavum, Than Vilaichchalai Arukkiravarkalaakavum, Than Yuththa Aayudhangalaiyum Than Radhangalin Panimuttukalaiyum Pannukiravarkalaakavum, Avarkalai Vaiththukkolluvaan.
13 ungal Kumaaraththikalaip Parimaladhailam Seykiravarkalaakavum, Samaiyal Pannukiravarkalaakavum, Appam Sutukiravarkalaakavum Vaiththukkolluvaan.
14 ungal Vayalkalilum, Ungal Thiraatchaththottangalilum, Ungal Olivaththoppukalilum, Nallavaikalai Etuththukkontu, Than Oozhiyakkaararukkuk Kotuppaan.
15 ungal Thaaniyaththilum Ungal Thiraatchappalanilum Thasamapaakam Vaangi, Than Piradhaanikalukkum Than Sevakarkalukkum Kotuppaan.
16 ungal Velaikkaararaiyum, Ungal Velaikkaarikalaiyum, Ungalil Thiramaiyaana Vaaliparaiyum, Ungal Kazhudhaikalaiyum Etuththu Thannutaiya Velaikku Vaiththukkolluvaan.
17 ungal Aatukalile Paththil Ondru Etuththukkolluvaan; Neengal Avanukku Velaiyaatkalaaveerkal.
18 neengal Therindhukonta Ungal Raajaavinimiththam Annaalile Muraiyituveerkal; Aanaalum Karththar Annaalile Ungalukkuch Chevikotukkamaattaar Endraan.
19 janangal Saamuvelin Sollaik Ketka Manadhillaamal: Appatiyalla, Engalukku Oru Raajaa Irukkaththaan Ventum.
20 sakala Jaadhikalaiyum Pola Naangalum Iruppom; Engal Raajaa Engalai Niyaayam Visaariththu, Engalukku Munpaakap Purappattu, Engal Yuththangalai Nataththaventum Endraarkal.
21 saamuvel Janangalin Vaarththaikalaiyellaam Kettu, Avaikalaik Karththaritaththil Theriyappatuththinaan.

22 karththar Saamuvelai Nokki: Nee Avarkal Sollaik Kettu, Avarkalai Aala Oru Raajaavai Erpatuththu Endraar; Appozhudhu Saamuvel Isravel Janangalaip Paarththu: Avaravar Thangal Oorkalukkup Pokalaam Endraan.
